title: Santander customers shut out of accounts in bungled IT upgrade
text:
Users of Santander’s private banking arm Cater Allen have been left struggling to access their accounts after a bungled launch of a new IT system.

The bank has moved 25pc of its customers onto a different internet banking website, but has been beset with complaints that the software does not work properly and is confusing.

Savers took to social media to complain they could only access their money through desktop computers and not mobile phones or tablets.

Cater Allen customers also report not being able to see their bank balance or previous transactions, that drop-down menus do not work properly and that information does not display clearly.
